Summary: i went outside for a cigar, and looked northeast like i usually do and the object in the distance...it went up and down and then disappeared in the southeast.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Appleton
There were no other sightings in Appleton on or around February 16th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a nice, fairly clear night and went outside to look at the stars and noticed an object to the northeast, and noticed a pulsating and red and white lights ..it would then dim when it stopped and brighten up when it would move then disappeared to the southeast. I'm an ex- airline pilot with many, many years being around flying objects. Nothing can fly at right angles the way it did. I wasn't drinking, and could not believe what I saw. It only last about 20 seconds and it was over. I go out every night and look in this direction hoping to see it again. And in that direction is a major power plant about 5 miles from where I live. I'm just guessing it may have had something to do with it being in that area. Thanks, Jim
